column4: Will somebody please help me install the jave jre for x64 that I have dowbloaded?

try to install it, break your system nearly irreparably, then cry here and we'll help you restore your system; remember to be polite throughout the process because after all this you now cannot uninstall Java without expert help.
the repositories don't have an x64 JRE?
I don't think so but am not posaitive.  Anyway the load I got from the respos does not work in firefox.
